lead_paragraph: MARGOLIES--Steven, M.D.,passed on Monday, April 25, 2016. He was a Medical Director of Clinical Programs for Fidelis Care statewide and also Medical Director for Leake and Watts, Yonkers, NY. He was formerly Vice President and Medical Director of Phoenix House's New York State operations. He was board certified in Addiction Medicine and a General Practitioner. He earned his M.D. from Stony Brook University and his BS from the Sophie Davis School of Biomedical Education, City College. He is survived by his beloved family; wife Micheline, parents Eileen and Alvin, as well as aunts, uncles, in-laws, niece, nephew, cousins and beloved pet Noodles. In lieu of flowers, donations can be made to Hemophilia Association of New York--131 West 33rd St., Suite 11D, New York, NY 10001. Services will be held Wednesday, April 27 at 1pm at Boulevard-Riverside Chapels - 1450 Broadway, Hewlett, NY 11557. 1/3
